website_summaries.verdict: The best all-around heavy-duty laundry sorter that will last you and your family for years to come.
pros: Customers appreciate the large amount of clothes this hamper holds
Features durable rubber wheels and metal frame
Includes bar to hang clothes and accessories
cons: Hamper is composed of one bag with three divided sections, rather than three separate bags

customer_reviews.title: Major Design Flaw where the wheels connect
customer_reviews.text: This cart didn't last a year, the main problem I had with this cart was the weak bond between the wheels and the four metal rods. Construction overall its excellent, it's just that its UNUSABLE if it doesn't have the wheels working. I own some cheap plastic laundry carts and they have lasted more than two years. The company should fix their design flaw. This shouldn't happen especially for the price. Every month I had to tighten the screws so it wouldn't wobble and the wheels just come off easily. 1 star since the wheel and metal frame are not strong.
customer_reviews.author: David Guzman

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY...READ FIRST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this item!!! I barely used it, and the wheels are loose! The threads where the wheels attach, is simply pressed into the tubing, and very insecure! The wheel now just bends, making the basket non-rolling, and the other wheels are getting loose also. I thought that the threaded piece would be welded for this prices and "commercial" status..but it appears simply pressed in! It is a defect which will come up..and now that the 30 days has expired, there is no return. I will reconsider buying any more items from Amazon, with such a poor return policy. They don't stand behind their products.I will stick with Costco!
customer_reviews.author: Gus G.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Great!
customer_reviews.text: This way exceeded my expectations and is definitely a lifetime hamper for home use as well as a sturdy hamper for commercial use. We bought 2 to fit under a folding table in a laundry room. This is one of the most useful items I have ever invested in.
customer_reviews.author: Missy M

customer_reviews.title: The hamper itself it as expected, simple to put ...
customer_reviews.text: The hamper itself it as expected, simple to put together and about the quality I expected. The fly in the ointment is that their customer services is absolutely non-existent. I was missing one of bolts needed for assembly. After two weeks of numerous attempts to contact them via phone and email I ended up going out and buying my own bolt to finish the assembly. *Update* I finally heard back from them regarding the missing part. Still not ideal customer support, but at least they made good on getting the situation resolved
customer_reviews.author: Carl Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!! Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect tool for someone with back pain problems. Easy to roll casters can be locked if needed. Plenty of room for laundry basket so no lifting it up and down. Plenty of room to hang clothes directly from the dryer. Has small knobs on each end so that clothes don't fall off ends. Easy to assemble; only requires a screwdriver. Nice sturdy thick wall tubing construction. Well worth the money for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa HTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very large, sturdy commercial grade.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to replace our dirty laundry basket that fell apart. Just received this one. Well packaged, easy to assemble, no need for tools, all you need is in package. First impression: super sturdy, commercial grade wheels, very large size, nice comfortable height to push without breaking your back, good looking (for a laundry basket) with a very big white, thick, waterproof bag. The bag is folded and attached to the top and although you could take it off to carry laundry, it would not be practical or super easy and after all no need since it is on wheels... Will use and update review if anything comes up. So far, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ig140

customer_reviews.title: Good size for us.  Rolls easy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is always looking for help (can't lift heavy), now she has a butler! The poly-wheels initially had that burnt rubber smell, after a few days, not noticed now. This was as easy as expected to assemble. Since it is a mass produced item made of stamped metal tubes, it did take some manual force to get everything lined up. Screws wanted to walk sideways etc but take a moment to be sure things are all squared and aligned and then it goes together well. Rolls very easy. Size is small enough to tuck in small spaces but still hold a fare amount of clothes. Overall a win!
customer_reviews.author: Dougboffl

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry Butler!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I needed something that brings the clothes closer to me so I don’t have to bend down so far to get to them. I left the bar off so I could slide it under my laundry room folding table. It might seem like you can’t do that but I assembled it as per the instructions but I left the whole bar off. I had nuts that fit perfectly on the screws that came included, and attached those inside the metal tubing. It’s a sturdy basket that went together very easily. I wish they included plastic caps to cap off the metal tubing if the customer isn’t planning on using the upper bar-but it’s not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieB

customer_reviews.title: This is not a commercial grade product!
customer_reviews.text: The weld that is inside the leg where you screw the wheels in is barely spot welded around the edges. The weld snapped on use 1, making the wheel impossible to reattach. Commercial grade products don't break after one use.
customer_reviews.author: J Spring

customer_reviews.title: Best Laundry Cart Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry cart. Over the years I've purchased many other carts which were all cheaply made, not very functional, and plain disappointing. I like the shelf underneath the cart it's great for storing detergent and fabric softener. The cart is also very study and I like that you can also hang clothes that you do not want to fold right on the top of the cart. It's so nice that a couple of times other residents in my building tried to take it from the laundry room thinking it belong to our co-oop lol. I purchased it used for around $75 but it seemed brand new not even a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Thornton

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. The instructions were a bit of a wtf when I saw them but no harder than Ikea instructions. I did need the hubby’s help when it came to the basket and lining up the holes. Over all took about 30-40 minutes. Very happy with it. I will say careful when using a drill, I did end up stripping a screw, but at my own fault.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi B

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have this for in my laundry room/garage. It is the perfect height for my front loaders on the drawers. Saves me from bending over (I have a bad back) and keeps me from dropping clean clothes on the floor. I fold my clothes out of the dryer and into the basket and hang the shirts from the bar on top. It's made laundry a lot less tedious. It was easy to put together and I haven't had any problems with it shaking or rocking or being unsteady in any way. Great value, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Have BIG LOADS of laundry? This is for you!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this awesome hamper. I love it, fits nicely in my closet. (Closet door: 27 in. (69cm); Closet itself is 26 in. (67cm) by 36in. (92cm) Measurements of hamper, assembled: width of opening: 23 in. (59cm) Height 32 .5 in. (84cm)
customer_reviews.author: S. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing. It has made laundry time more bearable. I love that the hangers don’t slip off the top so I hang my clothes straight from the dryer , fold my pants into the bottom and then just push it to my room and back. It’s also great for the kids to take to put their dirty clothes in and bring it back to wash. My kids have a habit of dropping things so no trouble with this so far. They love not having to carry their clothes back and forth. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tui

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty, flimsy and not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth $85, you can get the same quality at harbor freight for maybe $40, flimsy and thin, the description says heavy duty and this is definitely not.
customer_reviews.author: droth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Large and Sturdy Laundry Hamper
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be much larger than we thought from the description. It is a sturdy unit, perfect for us and the rollers make it so easy to roll to the laundry room. Amazon may list along with it a "frequently bought together" item of a "Household Essentials Natural Cotton Laundry Bag Extra Large." Do not add this to your order thinking it is an additional bag for this Commercial Round Laundry Hamper. It is just an additional bag to stuff with laundry you may want to take to a laundromat. It does not insert into the Whitmor device.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wiebe

customer_reviews.title: BIG Hamper
customer_reviews.text: Go take a tape measure and pull out to 23.6 inches. Make sure that a circle of this diameter is what you want prior to purchasing. I thought I knew what this size would be, but once I put it together, this is much bigger than I thought it would be. However, it still fits in the corner of our bedroom and I LOVE that it's on wheels so I can just push it over to the washing machine. The whole thing is VERY sturdy and I'm impressed with the construction. It definitely has an industrial feel but it's simple enough that it can blend in almost anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gatoralum

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but BIG
customer_reviews.text: This item was as described, but was so big around, it wouldn't fit in the closet we had our old hamper in. It is very well made and sturdy and I loved not having to carry the laundry to the laundry room as rolling it is so much easier!!! This will hold a ton of laundry and is bigger than the laundry two of us produce in a week (and my husband is in construction). This would be great for a large family, but just make sure you have a big area to put it in!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia K.

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong and Quite Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool looking but overall, great size for apartment living if you have laundry on different floors, OR just in house to save your back. For years I've been picking up my laundry basket and always dropping clean pillow cases or whatever on the floor...until now. Dig this unit but also great rollers. They are really quality and I'm glad I got this one despite the higher price when searching for "rolling laundry baskets". It's actually quite low priced when I saw the quality. I'm wondering if there is a second insert bag I can get...but I like it's easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: kamline

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cart!
customer_reviews.text: This laundry cart is awesome! It is very sturdy, and was easy to assemble. I had been using the laundromat for the past year, and really liked the carts there. I realized I could get one for home. This works well for getting laundry from the dryer to my folding area, but is great for moving others things around the house as well. I chose this cart after looking at similar carts, some cheaper, because of weight capacity and reviews stating how sturdy it is. I'm glad I chose this cart, it is very sturdy and stable, no wiggling or shimmy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY.. no more clothes on the floor
customer_reviews.text: We have so much laundry for 2 ppl.. and I'm over my husband using the floor when our older laundry basket is full. YES. We should do laundry but we are both so business and it gets pushed back.. This laundry basket is huge.. I love it..and the wheels are great. I hate carrying heavy loads to the laundry room. It wasnt hard at all to put together either. You just have to read.. no pictures on each step.. just 1 big diagram for reference.
customer_reviews.author: MAGS

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy metal construction
customer_reviews.text: I had the top rod, including the slide-out extensions, packed full of shirts on hangers along with a few jackets, for a couple of weeks. It didn't collapse, even while rolling around on the beefy wheels. Note that the hamper section consists of a single large bag, with two dividers attached with velcro. I would have preferred three separate bags.
customer_reviews.author: x475aws

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for older homeowner on one floor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this prior to foot surgery when I wouldn't be able to walk and my husband had to bring the laundry to our machines and didn't want to have to carry anything. It holds a lot ( as it says commercial) and isn't too wide to go through doorways that could be concerning. The best thing is that it's on wheels, so it rolls from room to room! My only very slight problem was that one of the black round wheel protectors was missing, but I put it together anyway.
customer_reviews.author: ImeldaM

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry hamper I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after I moved into my dorm, I needed something large and with wheels and boy did this deliver. It wound up being roughly the size of a barrel and takes up a fair amount of space in my room. However, that doesn't detract from the quality of the product. For anyone looking for a large hamper on wheels, this is the best value for your dollar. Quality 5/5 Attractiveness 2/5 Value 4/5 Durability 5/5 User Friendliness 3/5
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to assemble even I can do it (sorry I have COPD and can't lift 10 pounds) I'm thrilled with it as have others and they eventually fall apart or the wheels fall off or jam. Will follow up if it happens with this one but I don't foresee it happening. Well worth the money. Service is fantastic. Needed part replacement took 3 hours to get it resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry solution on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This hamper is easy to assemble and bigger than we imagined. It is waist high and there is no way we can put our arms around it. It is perfect for sorting and managing large loads. We dont do laundry daily so it builds up and the weight has broken our previous hampers. This one won't break! It really is a commercial grade BEST PART - NO MORE LIFTING!
customer_reviews.author: Puddle dive

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: If you’re in the market for a reasonably priced, Industrial performing family oriented laundry bin, this is your choice. Yes, it’s big. As such it takes up a bit of room. But you will not be disappointed. It is easy to assemble and of great value given the price. It’s sturdy and suitable for even the roughest home environment. The wheels are large making it easy to roll over chords or other small obstacles. All in all a good investment, if laundry baskets are an investment. PRO - Big - Well Made - Easy to Assemble - Durable CONS - It’s BIG, difficult to reach the bottom without long arms - Storage Footprint (it’s BIG)
customer_reviews.author: David T Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This product has a sturdy feel to it with good wheels with foot brakes ...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend wanted a laundromat style wheeled laundry basket. After reading reviews of less expensive types that stated them being a little "flimsy" I went with suggestions to go with a more heavy duty model. This product has a sturdy feel to it with good wheels with foot brakes on two of the wheels. The hanging bar can be easily removed if need be. It is more pricey ($71 on amazon) than the lighter and thinner built metal baskets but if you really want this type of cart this seems like it will be long lasting and will handle your laundry needs in the home.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even question- just get it you’ll be happy you did
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy high capacity laundry tool. I love how easy it was to assemble and how easy it makes collecting laundry from all over my house. I also really like how much laundry it holds. 2 king size comforters and a standard laundry basket full of clothes. The wheels are great and it rolls quite nicely over carpet, hardwood& tile. I am sad I didn’t buy this sooner. And I’m going to get another one. I’d highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: ch

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger in person than I expected. My husband complains that it takes up too much space in the garage. I love it though. When I'm doing laundry for four people I can dump all my clean laundry into it out of the dryer. I have three or four loads in it right now. Maybe that's bad. Now I don't have a reason to put stuff away to clear up hamper space. I love how it rolls too. So smooth and quiet. Makes lugging baskets in and out of the house so much easier. It seems very sturdy and we'll made. Easy to put together. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mellit21

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed all through the assembly with this units sturdiness and design. THEN, I executed the last assembly step - INSTALLING THE THREE COMPARTMENT SPACERS, WHICH WERE VELCRO'D IN PLACE! Totally lame design. I think I can salvage everything else by buying three slim hamper bags from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinin

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Better made than any I've seen in laundry mats. Really needed a place to hang my laundry as it came out of the dryer and basket for folded items. Also I roll the loaded rack full of hung clothes and baskets to the three stairs I have to go up to get out of the laundry room. I can go up the stairs and reach over and lift hangers off. Love this thing and it's high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, quality material, strong, and big.
customer_reviews.text: Living in an apartment building and having to do laundry downstairs isn't great. But now that I've upgrade from hauling crappy mesh bags I don't mind. It's designed well and made to last. Putting it together is simple and easy. The wheels work great and I have no problem push it around. It's also great if you have a lot of things to move around or bring out to the car, just dump in whatever bags, backpacks, suitcases, its pretty big and the canvas material is strong enough I wouldn't worry about it breaking unless I took a knife to it. It's large enough to hold about 3-4 washers of laundry which is great if you live in an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just redid laundry room. Had to remove old hanging bar to make room for new stacked washer and dryer. This cart fits perfectly next to that and gives me place to hang up clothes as I pull them out of the dryer. I cannot fit bottles of detergent or fabric softener on bottom shelf (about 9-1/2" clearance) but have other things that fit on shelf. I just put bottles of detergent etc. on one side of basket and still plenty of room left to place folded laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P

customer_reviews.title: Wide basket, great for apartments
customer_reviews.text: Very functional cart. Has a wide basket that’s good for picking items out as you sort clothes into the washer. Reminds me of the carts in my old apartment laundry room. Not commercial grade, but more solid than big box store wire products. Upper hanging rack a little wobbly bc it connects via “push button lock” rather than a screw. Wheels veer off, so you do have to guide it. Wish there was a two tier basket option. Basket is not removable. Excellent for two person apt size.
customer_reviews.author: Clickhappy

customer_reviews.title: Maybe this is great for people who only have to move this amount ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for almost a year. I've already had to repair the thing twice. The wheels are all wonky at this point, and the entire frame seems to gradually shimmy itself loose with repeated use. Maybe this is great for people who only have to move this amount of laundry a little ways, but for, say, moving large loads to a shared laundry room in an apartment building, it just didn't hold up long term. Which is sad, because it is the PERFECT size for large amounts of laundry, and the bag holding the laundry is super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sometime Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching and looking for a good looking, solid laundry basket on wheels for quite some time. I found it. It is very big by the way. Looks great and is excellent quality. I am not good at putting things together so I paid someone to do it for it. He took about 15 mins. Love it. The only thing I would have liked is for there to be 2 compartments, one for whites and one for colors. Maybe the Whitmor will pay attention to what customers want and improve their product in the future. Highly recommend it!!! The best laundry basket on wheels on the market from my perspective. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Janaki Bakshi

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I could have purchased as a mom who constantly does laundry! It arrived in just a couple days, it took only a few minutes to assemble, and it’s so sturdy! My favorite part is the removable hamper part that you’re able to clean. 10/10! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can use it for more than laundry
customer_reviews.text: My laundry area is close to the door for the garage but my kitchen is not. This basket is very handy when bringing in lots of groceries since my kitchen is a good walk. I can put the grocery bags in the cart and wheel it over to the kitchen. It's great to have two uses for this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Minton

customer_reviews.title: A great laundry addition!
customer_reviews.text: This was a want not a need but it has become invaluable. I decided to test myself to this because I love using these baskets at the laundromat! I have found putting the wet laundry into the basket and then into the drier saves my back. Lots less twisting! It is sturdy and rolls well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fien

customer_reviews.title: Massive!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing Is HUGE, and was here in less than 2 days! Easy to put together. Largest laundry bin I’ve ever seen! Would be great to hold sport balls in the garage or stuffed animal toys, would work great for a daycare laundry bin as well, highly recommend I’ll be buying another soon!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: dividers do NOT stay intact
customer_reviews.text: This laundry hamper is made of good solid materials but it has a MAJOR FLAW. There is one main container separated by two dividers which are attached to the walls by inferior Velcro straps that do NOT hold. If drop a pile of clothes in the hamper, they come off. If the hamper is full, they come off. If you grab a big pile of clothes out to wash, they come off. I do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Backpackrat

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a Christmas present to my parents. Surprise, no bolts to put it together. I should have put it together beforehand, instead of wrapping the box up. So do I send it all back and take my chances on getting one that has all the parts or do I just go to Lowe's and buy the parts. Not worth the hassle to send all back, so off I go to Lowe's to find replacement parts. Not happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a new laundry set with pedestals. Them realized my wife had effort lifting laundry into and out of units from floor level. This laundry butler fit even with the bottom of the doors and made it much easier on her back to load and unload both washer and dryer. Butler is well made and is right size for normal laundry basket to fit in the butler basket. Clothes hanger is right height and we especially like the stops on each end of top bar so hangers do not slip off end. Fine product. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MLV

customer_reviews.title: Great but just too big
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, and tried three different laundry hamper options. This one is much larger than I thought, but that's my fault for not more closely looking at the diameter of the hamper. Well made as are all of this brands options. USA made for all, and that's nice too.
customer_reviews.author: ljvirgo

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: Five stars so far! Easy to assemble, clearly a tough commercial grade product, and HUGE! Exactly what I want to have sitting underneath my laundry chute. Rolls easily across my basement floor to the machines, and frees up my baskets for use on clean and folded clothing. A bit of a strong smell when first unpackaged (the sack) but I'm sure it will air out. If it bothers you, just wash it. I'll try to up part an update in a few months after regular use. I will not be taking it up and down a hallway or through a building. It will mostly roll back and forth the 30 feet from my laundry chute to my washer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Renner

customer_reviews.title: Arms extend too!
customer_reviews.text: The dividers inside the larger bin are velcro, so it didn't separate completely from bin 1 to bin 2 and 3, but it doesn't affect performance. You toss in clothes. And they don't move to the next bin. So it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on many other units I chose this one because it looked sturdier. Based on a couple weeks of use I think this was a good choice. It assembled easily and seems well made and sturdy. All metal frame that uses spring pins to hold it together. No plastic and not slip joints to deteriorate. It rolls easily on large swivel castors. The only negative is that the bin dividers are located by three Velcro strips on each side. They do not hold if the bins are packed. Also, be aware this unit is larger than others. It is a wider so make sure you have the space for it.
customer_reviews.author: bigfooted

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and what an improvement to my laundry situation in the garage. The garage is not an optimal place to do laundry unless you have a folding cabinet or table. The laundry butler facilitates the hanging process and storage until I can take clothes into the house. I can fold clothes in basket til I have time to put away. It makes laundry TOLERABLE.
customer_reviews.author: paula schultz

customer_reviews.title: The wheels roll easily. I like that the rim is rust proof ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality constructed laundry hamper. I just wish it was a bit smaller, but that's my fault, not the product. It has a rugged liner which can be removed to clean. The wheels roll easily. I like that the rim is rust proof and so I can lay wet laundry over the edge to dry rather than toss it into the hamper and risk mildew of other contents.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great!...until the wheel falls off
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with everything about this laundry cart - the bag is big, sturdy and tough, it maneuvers really well, and was the perfect size for the family’s laundry - UNTIL a wheel fell off. The point where the wheels are connected to the bars isn’t reinforced and the wheel continues to fall off. For $60, I’d expect it to last longer. If they could figure out the design flaw w/the wheels, this would be a super product.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love !
customer_reviews.text: These have far exceeded my expectations. I got 3 thinking I may need 4. Not sure of the size or quality. 1st they are very big, it holds way more than I expected. Well over 1 load. Probably close to 3 good size loads. 2nd The caster wheels are very sturdy, roll nicely and quiet. 3rd. The canvas is also nice and thick not cheesy. Extremely easy to put together. Just save wheels for last. 😬😅 I will use one for towels and linens. One for light and one for dark laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a laundry bag to haul heavy stuff this is a must. I live in a complex on the 12th floor, and laundry is in the basement. this hamper moves smoothly and easy to push around to lug your laundry or even groceries. a must buy,
customer_reviews.author: Beisan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised of the quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews. I purchased this product for my mother. She is 92 and lives in an assisted living facility with my 95 year old father. She does her laundry every Friday and Saturday and was having trouble finding a laundry cart to use. So, I found this on Amazon and ordered it for her. It arrived the next day after the order and I was very surprised by the quality and sturdiness of the cart. I was expecting something a little flimsy and not necessarily high quality. This was neither. It is Bright, Study, and solid. It should serve her well, hopefully, for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Randall J Smith

customer_reviews.title: I think i'll be buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom who has trouble moving clothing to and from the laundry. This thing is GREAT! I'm thinking of buying another one. Make sure you have some space to store it though - this is bigger than it looks - almost, if not, trash can size.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Buck

customer_reviews.title: The Mother of All Commercial Laundry Butlers.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solidly-constructed laundry butler that doesn't have the sway associated with the cheaper versions. Installation was easy, and I was happy to see so many bolts in the key areas. I think just about any grown-up could put this together in about 30 minutes, even without access to power tools. I have rolled this sucker all up and down our house, and it keeps nice and plumb while rolling. Well-designed and intelligent features like the knobs to keep on hangers, the baskets, and the locking casters are what make it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Armi

customer_reviews.title: Beware Bad Construction!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for less than 6 months and two of the wheels have already fallen off. Welds on the bottom that hold the thread for the wheels failed both times.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Busse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a while before writing a review about this hamper just because I wanted to make sure that it wasn’t going to get wobbly after a while. It’s been about a year and it’s still in great shape and since I have to drag it across carpet it has withstand that and it doesn’t seem to scratch my other floors when I pull it/push it. It holds about 3 heavy loads (towels/jeans/coats). It’s super sturdy. The only I wish it came in darker colors. You can remove the cloth and wash it but i would like a darker one just for looks
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Back saver!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. After she had back surgery laundry was a real problem for her. This product really helps. Well worth the price and it is commercial quality.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Well-designed. Perfect for moving laundry to and from our stacked W/D.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. Pay attention to the screw lengths and instruction sequence and everything lines up and screws together right. Big casters. It is stable. Can't do without it now. Perfect for moving laundry loads.
customer_reviews.author: Will S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy laundry cart!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother as a gift and it's fabulous!! Very sturdy!! My dad put it together pretty quickly. Wheels are great quality, not cheapie plastic ones. You can hang a good bit of clothes. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Happy even with the illogical challenges
customer_reviews.text: Well, this definitely had some challenges getting holes to line up, managing parts were awkward. Too bad the lower shelf doesn’t allow for standing laundry products; that’s goofy. NO LOGICAL INSTRUCTIONS so, It’s a bit wobbly ... but I needed it, it works, great that it rolls, can move top dryer load into basket and hang items on top rail and move room to room. Good space saver. I’m pleaded.
customer_reviews.author: DebzDesign

customer_reviews.title: Makes laundry day awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large home and transferring both soiled and clean clothes back and forth from one end of the house to the other was tiresome. This tool has made my job much easier. The cost was great since I am a Prime member and did not have to pay for shipping. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great Hamper just needs to extra bag option
customer_reviews.text: Hamper works great. Have this hamper for 2 years and the wheels fell off 2x since my purchase. I popped wheels back and it rolls fine from my laundry chute to laundry rm moves back and forth about 30ft daily. Only problem is the bag has shredded. Need a replacement now
customer_reviews.author: yve

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for doing laundry and hanging clothes. It is big tho so if u have a small laundry room make sure to measure for size. It rolls easy plus has locking wheels for times when you don't want it to roll.
customer_reviews.author: pinky pink

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made home unit
customer_reviews.text: This rack isn't quite "commercial" quality, but it is nice and sturdy for home use and I have no complaints. It has very good wheels and rolls easily over uneven surfaces. We hang our dry cleaning on the rack on ours and it's been indispensable so far. My only quibble, if any, is that the "bumpers" are silly useless bits of plastic; we never bothered to put them on. The bottom shelf is also somewhat pointless, but I guess if you live in an apartment it might be useful for a box of soap or something.
customer_reviews.author: Hail, Marcabia

customer_reviews.title: Laundromat Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Same durability and maneuverability as the carts in the laundromat. It took about 45 minutes to assemble, so if you aren't good with picture instructions - take your time.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesgirl99

customer_reviews.title: Now the kids love getting the laundry!
customer_reviews.text: As a large family with 5 kids, gathering all of our laundry was such a big deal, now the kids fight over who gets to push the cart and gather all the laundry. And when the bag gets wet or dirty - we just throw that in the wash too. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I had to get some sturdier and longer screws than what came with it. But a simple stop at the hardware store and $5 later, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GBerios

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid, Nice, Wide Opening and Holds a Lot!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased! We have a laundry shoot so I needed a hamper that would have a wide opening at the top to catch clothing as it fell from the ceiling in the basement. I was concerned that if the opening wasn't large enough clothes would pile on top or miss the hamper all together. Not a problem with this one! As well, it is an attractive commercial quality product. I appreciate that it is pleasant to look at as it sits in our tv room. Building it was a sinch and its very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, helpful
customer_reviews.text: Makes laundry MUCH easier. Holds a lot of laundry, with plenty of space for hangers, so that we can hang up shirts to keep them from getting wrinkled. I don't like the wheels though. You can lock them so the cart won't roll, but you can't "lock" them into a set position to roll them more easily without so much steering.
customer_reviews.author: Special Apps, Special Kids

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with my laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with my laundry hamper!!! As other reviewers have stated, it is large! But I live in a condo where I have to travel down a long hallway and 3 stories on an elevator. Prior to purchasing this, I had to take multiple loads up and down, and it was very inconvenient. This hamper holds at least 4 loads (that's the most I've ever had), and my small dog likes riding on top of the laundry as well. :) It is sturdy and well made. I've had to tighten the wheels once, but I pull the hamper over several bumpy thresholds each way, so that isn't surprising.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Giant basket
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really huge. Like too huge unless you have a family of 5 sharing the same basket. The photo makes it look tall and narrow, but in reality it's almost 2 feet wide. Easy to put together (less than 10 minutes for one person) and seems solid. I ordered it because the reviews were positive and photo made it look nice. In reality it looks like an industrial or hospital sized hamper. Hard to find a place in my home where it doesnt look out of place.
customer_reviews.author: H12345

customer_reviews.title: The basket holds 2 large loads of laundry easily. Perfect height for folding laundry from dryer and ...
customer_reviews.text: Get it for sure! I replaced an old 2 tiered canvas held-together-with-duct tape laundry cart with this one and I am psyched! As a person with mobility issues, I need all the help I can get. The basket holds 2 large loads of laundry easily. Perfect height for folding laundry from dryer and putting it right into basket while sitting in my wheelchair. Rod above is super handy. Rolls easily from room to room to put stuff away. It does wobble a little bit, but with clothes in it, you barely notice it. Very professional looking. Fast delivery, easy to put together, I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents who bought a condo in a 55+. They have a laundry facility they share with other residents and they get compliments on it all the time. They sometimes even have used it to bring heavier items (for them) up to their unit from the car. They LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this product very much. Bought a large home then the last and this wheeling basket has come in very handy. Put together easily and its very sturdy. Wheels are very smooth across both floor and carpet.
customer_reviews.author: jcv: a great product especially the display

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you read the size info
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper, but the actual size was larger than I thought. Make sure you have enough space for this monster. It is easy to assemble and appears quite sturdy. It is a bit tall for me (to reach the bottom, I need to tip the hamper). Upon unpacking, the bag exuded a chemical smell, but that mostly went away after a day or two. Otherwise, I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: catnip033

customer_reviews.title: Good for one month
customer_reviews.text: When i first purchased it I loved it. It helped me fit my kids clothing with sheets in it to the laundry room with no issues. But unfortunately less than a month later the hamper is tilted more towards one side and there doesn’t seem to be a way to get a replacement or get in contact with anyone. For $65 it should have been better. If i could get a replacement i would be happy and give it 5 stars again
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love this laundry helper. Yay
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this new addition to my laundry room. It’s helped so much gather all the dirty laundry then when it’s done hang it up right away and roll back into the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for Big families
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these hampers, and am going to purchase at least one more. They're steady, durable, and great for keeping the laundry room floor clear. The wheels are also a life-saver!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Mireles

customer_reviews.title: Was so tired of the plastic garbage ones that kept breaking
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to say great job this is exactly what I wanted okay maybe not the price I wanted but it’s what you gotta oh for to get quality specifications and I’m cool with it.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Huge, but great if you have the space.
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé has this ridiculous need to dirty clothes and towels when it's not needed. So, the laundry basket was always overflowing. Since we live in an older high rise apartment building, the laundry room is on another floor. I would have to pull out additional baskets to get all of the laundry up there. Now it all fits in one AND it's on wheels! That's where it lost the star. It's super easy to put together. It took me 20 minutes alone, just as the instructions said. However, I could never get the wheels level. It hasn't caused a problem yet, but we will see.
customer_reviews.author: CJShopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent company to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Works very good have a pretty narrow hallway. Very well-made and sturdy I can get about three loads of laundry in there. Which is great because I have a family of four. Great company to work with, my product was missing one wheel when I got it. So I called them up and told them, and they shipped it out no questions asked didn't charge me nothing. It's pretty sturdy ,can get top-heavy if you put too much on the top hanging .Not enough on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty shopper

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Makes laundry time enjoyable. Assembly - easy. Construction - good quality including rolling wheels (smooth, do not feel rickety or cheap). Function - rolls well on tiled basement floor. Good size. Makes loading/transferring from washer to dryer so much easier. Bar over top can be used to hang garments to dry on a hanger. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a lady that was having hand issues and could no longer carry a laundry basket. On receiving the Laundry Butler the basket was bent in multiple locations (shipping issue not a manufacturing issue). I contacted customer service at Whitmore (Southhaven, MS) via their website. They promptly sent a replacement basket. The Laundry Butler has performed well with the new basket. Take your time in assembly with especially with the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for parents in assisted living. Very stable, easy to maneuver, and sturdy. Nice size-plenty of room for everything, without being unmanageable. Assembly: picture, parts listed and arrows pointing to where they went, but did not include the order of assembly. Wasn’t difficult to figure out. Although similar design, is much nicer than the painted metal ones at laundromats! Parents love it, no more pushing the laundry basket, etc on the wheelchair!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Markiewicz

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases ever
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases ever. I love this thing. Perfect for all the clean clothes to go into and if you are like me clothes do not get folded right away so they are at least off the floor and the kids can dig through there and get what they want. It is also easy on my back to have the clothes in something high off the ground and I can go through and fold them and roll it down the hall to where the clothes need to be. Love this and may need to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Whitmore rolling hamper is worth every penny.  Definitely would recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.text: This Whitmore rolling hamper has really upgraded laundry day for me. I can sort what needs to be washed in the bedroom, layer it in the hamper and roll it to the laundry area. The wheels are large and easily roll through the house. The entire unit is strong and sturdy. Wish I'd bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible but not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: In the picture it looks good, and in reality it's not bad. However it is not sturdy. Kinda feels like its made of plastic it flexes so much. For household use it would be OK. I think if the sides were attached to the basket and the top hoop was one piece it would be perfect. Too many parts with just one screw to hold it results in movement of components when assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to my laundry room!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, and makes easy work carrying most anything without making so many trips back and forth. I have even put it at my back door to unload my grocery bags into and roll to my pantry. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: This item is not heavy duty as described. After ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is not heavy duty as described. After only about 5 weeks of use the caster bearings are falling out wheels do not function properly. Never again will I buy an item from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Arledge

customer_reviews.title: great laundry hamper on wheels
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Took my husband no time to assemble. It's very big but still fits through regular door frames. It rolls wonderfully and is super sturdy. I have a metal baby gate to keep my dogs in and it even fits through/over that. Easy to lift... I could go on. I had a wicker basket before that I tried to carry and I HATED it. This makes transferring my dirty clothes to our laundry room so much easier. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rick J. Neely

customer_reviews.title: Really happ with my "butler"
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery. Easy to assemble. Rolls smoothly. Added bonus I couldn't see before I ordered...It has little stops to keep hangers from sliding off the top.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Family of 4. This basket handles it all with little issue. My 16 year old son put this together. I store this in my garage next to the washer/dryer. It is not a small basket so don't purchase it if you are putting it in a confined space. Its size fits somewhere between a regular sized hamper, and commercial roll around cloths bin you would see in a dry cleaners business.
customer_reviews.author: B. Feo

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This item is a moms dream come true. It was super easy to assemble, nice durable fabric and it holds a ton of laundry. The cart has really nice wheels that make moving the cart around super easy and light, no matter how much is loaded in it. If you are looking at this product you know you need it. :)
customer_reviews.author: RJS USMC

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, commercial strength laundry cart
customer_reviews.text: Great laundry cart, but double check dimensions!! Much bigger than I was expecting. Very sturdy, commercial grade, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rue

customer_reviews.title: Decent little cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent laundry cart. It holds a large amount of laundry. The materials are good, but it doesn't feel 100% sturdy. There is one screw at the bottom and one at the top of each rail. If you're rolling it and going from carpet to wood floors and back again it can get our of true and lean a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: brian sanders

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Sorry I waited so long to get it. It's really good quality & was easy to assemble. I use it for laundry uses & just plain moving things from one place to another. Worth every penny. Good price & fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Carma

customer_reviews.title: Very large and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: WOW is this big. I am 72 yrs. young and was very easy to put together. The wheels run very smoothly over the floors even when it is full. Just really nice and very easy to move around. Measure your doors if you want to move from room to room - this is very large and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Stella D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for large families
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail 15 minutes ago and I already have it put together and ready to be used. I have a large family and I bought this to simplify my laundry room. I can now fit all my kids clothes in one spot, rather than have them spread throughout the house in smaller baskets. There are clips holding the bag onto the frame and I plan on using one of them to also clip on a mesh bag to wash my kids socks in. That way they all stay together and don't get lost. I very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for a Lower Price!
customer_reviews.text: Looked at many versions of such a product and couldn't believe how expensive they were! So glad I found this one. A much better price and for high quality. Basket was a lot bigger than I thought it would be which I was happy about. Wish it was a little higher up, though, as it can be a little difficult to steer at times with the bar that goes over top (wheels go in all directions). But I love it and am so glad to use it every laundry day. Helps make it easier in a big house!!
customer_reviews.author: TruRJDeau

product_meta.title: Whitmor Commercial Rolling Laundry Center with Removable Liner and Heavy Duty Wheels
product_meta.description: Size:LAUNDRY CENTERThe Commercial Laundry Center is easy to assemble and features a durable chromed metal frame. This laundry center includes a hanging bar that will help simplify and organize your laundry chores. A removable heavy duty polyester 3-section bag makes cleaning easy. You can keep your colors, whites, delicates, lingerie, and other clothes separated. This mobile laundry center uses heavy duty wheels for easy transportation. Two of the wheels can be locked in place when not required. Whitmor is a 4th generation family-owned and operated business. Since 1946, Whitmor has been dedicated to bringing organization home by creating products that simplify everyday life. Ensuring that those products are built with integrity, value, and innovation is our commitment to you. And our promise is that we will always be here for you should you ever need us as we stand behind our product 100%. Whitmor customer service is available in English and Spanish Monday through Friday from 8am - 4:30pm CST. Call us and we will gladly assist you in your language. Whitmor customer service Department, 1-888-944-8667
feature_bullets: Portable large capacity laundry hamper with a durable chromed metal frame and commercial grade swivel wheels
Wall saving bumpers to keep walls safe from damage
A removable and washable polyester fabric bag with tab fasteners for easy cleaning and transporting laundry
Assembled Dimensions: 24.25 L x 33.5 W x 70.70 H inches
Features hanging bar to help simplify and organize your laundry; great for home and commercial use
Steel handles and heavy-duty wheels make it easy to sort, stage and transport linens around the house
For over 70 years, Whitmor has been bringing organization home. If you have questions or problems, please contact us for immediate assistance

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,712 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
